notesStmt.note: Damaged leaves at ends, repaired and infilled. Usage stains. Very dark paper.

Folios 1 and 251: two astronomical tables, probably a 16th century addition. Folios 1 is mutilated. Folios 2 and 3: an index to the biblical passages in the Dal᾿alat Al-Ha᾿irin, apparently of 17th century. The beginning is missing and in the last column (folio 3v) the biblical indications have not been filled. Folio 248: a short additional piece, of probably 16th century.Folios 249 and 250: fragments of Saadia Gaon's Arabic commentary on the Psalms; parchment leaves of probably 14th century.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Guide for the Perplexed by Maimonides in Judeo-Arabic.

collation.p: 25 quires of 10 leaves each (folios 4-241), 1 quire of 6 leaves (folios 242-248), marked by catchwords and signature at the end and with signature at the beginning.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite semi-cursive script of the 15th century.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Dalalat Ul-Hairin. Arabic-Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 1423.'
